attributes.action: allow Ama Sumani to return to Britain to recieve treatment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it is not acceptable to deport some foreign national criminals because they may come to harm in their country of origin, then why is it acceptable to deport this lady? If the economies of less developed nations were not so stifled by richer nations, Britain would not have the immigration problems it has. Hopefully the world will become a fairer place one day, but in the meantime, please will you let Ama Sumani return for treatment?

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
